skill.Spooky.name: Scaring
Spooky5a.name: Ghost
Spooky5a.desc: Direction does not affect scare chance
Spooky5b.name: Zombie
Spooky5b.desc: Chance to not loose friendship when scaring

Spooky10a1.desc: Can scare multiple people around you at once.

Spooky10a2.desc: Gain Life and Stamina when you scare
Spooky10b1.name: Vampire
Spooky10b1.desc: Chance to get better items from scaring
Spooky10b2.name: Ghoul

Thief5b.name: Robin Hood

config.DeScary.tooltip:
Changes the Scaring Skill and theme to that of Thieving.
THIS REQUIRES A RESTART TO WORK.
DO NOT DO THIS MID SAVE AFTER YOU PLAYED FOR A BIT.
The theiving professions and scary professions have different IDs
config.Key_Cast.tooltip: Press this key to scare/steal NPCs when near them.
config.ExpMod.tooltip: This will change how much exp all other options are multiplied by
config.ExpFromFail.tooltip: If you fail at Scaring/Stealing, you will get this much exp.
config.ExpLevel1.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 1 success
config.ExpLevel2.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 2 success
config.ExpLevel3.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 3 success
config.ExpLevel4.tooltip: How much exp you get at a tier 4 success
